name: Brand Mentions Analysis
description: Tracks how often and in what context your brand is mentioned across AI search engines
insights: Your brand appears in 45% of relevant AI search results
Mention frequency increased 15% this month
Primary context: enterprise software solutions

issues.title: Limited mention in comparison queries
issues.description: Brand rarely appears when users ask 'best alternatives to...'

recommendations.title: Create comparison content targeting alternative queries
recommendations.description: Develop detailed comparison guides that position your product in competitive contexts

name: Sentiment & Perception
description: Analyzes the tone and sentiment of brand mentions in AI-generated responses
insights: 92% of mentions have positive or neutral sentiment
Strong association with innovation and reliability
Customer success stories frequently cited

issues.title: Pricing perception inconsistency
issues.description: Some AI responses characterize pricing as 'premium' while others say 'competitive'
issues.impact: May cause confusion for price-sensitive prospects

recommendations.title: Clarify pricing positioning in public content
recommendations.description: Publish transparent pricing guides with clear value propositions

name: E-E-A-T & Trust Signals
description: Evaluates Experience, Expertise, Authoritativeness, and Trustworthiness signals
insights: Strong technical documentation cited by AI models
Leadership content frequently referenced
Third-party validation from industry analysts present

issues.title: Limited case study visibility
issues.description: Customer success stories not being picked up by AI crawlers
issues.impact: Missing social proof in AI responses about real-world implementation

recommendations.title: Optimize case study structure for AI consumption
recommendations.description: Reformat case studies with clear problem-solution-results sections and structured data

name: Non-Branded Keyword Coverage
description: Measures visibility for industry terms and problem-space queries (non-branded)
insights: Strong presence for branded terms (95% coverage)
Weak presence for problem-space queries (40% coverage)
Competitor content dominates educational queries

issues.title: Low visibility in 'how to' queries
issues.description: Brand absent from AI responses to implementation and tutorial queries
issues.impact: Missing early-stage buyers in research phase

issues.title: Generic industry terms underrepresented
issues.description: Competitors mentioned 3x more often for broad category searches
issues.impact: Lower share of voice in category-defining moments

recommendations.title: Develop comprehensive tutorial and guide library
recommendations.description: Create 20+ high-quality guides addressing common implementation challenges

name: Competitive Intelligence
description: Compares your AI visibility against key competitors
insights: Main competitor has 15% higher mention rate
You lead in technical depth mentions
Competitor dominates pricing comparison queries

issues.title: Underrepresented in direct comparisons
issues.description: When users ask 'X vs Y', your brand is 'Y' only 30% of the time
issues.impact: Missing consideration set for active buyers

recommendations.title: Create competitor comparison pages
recommendations.description: Publish honest, detailed comparisons for top 5 competitors

name: Content Gap Analysis
description: Identifies topics and queries where your brand should appear but doesn't
insights: 127 high-value queries with zero brand presence
Emerging use cases not covered in content
Integration topics underserved

issues.title: No content for 'best practices' queries
issues.description: AI models cite competitors for industry best practices content

issues.title: Integration guides missing
issues.description: No discoverable content about integrating with popular tools
issues.impact: Technical buyers unable to find implementation details

recommendations.title: Launch best practices content series
recommendations.description: Create 15+ articles covering industry best practices with your expertise

recommendations.title: Develop integration documentation
recommendations.description: Publish detailed guides for top 10 integration scenarios

name: Citation & Source Quality
description: Tracks which of your sources are being cited by AI models and their quality
insights: Documentation cited 45% of the time when brand mentioned
Blog posts have 2.3x higher citation rate than landing pages
Video transcripts rarely cited (only 5% of video content)

issues.title: Product pages not being cited
issues.description: Core product information pages have low citation rates
issues.impact: AI responses use outdated or incomplete product info

recommendations.title: Restructure product pages for AI readability
recommendations.description: Add clear sections, FAQs, and structured data to product pages
